feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.47
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • BBUI TS scaffolding + helpers conversion by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15385
  • Convert viewBuilder.spec.js to ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15382
  • Typing some components and returning 404 for views not found by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15384
  • Remove old migration system. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15373
  • Extract automation step definitions out into shared-core. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15383
  • login platform user after forced password reset by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15406
  • Redirect to account page for account password reset by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15404

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.46...3.2.47

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • JS console log support by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15402
  • Aligning the way that tableselector and datasourceselector display by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15413

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.47...3.3.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve typing around automations and automation testing by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15407
  • Fix an issue that broke creating new table screen modal by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15422

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.3.0...3.3.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Convert remaining portal stores to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15356
  • Validate datasource setting on components by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15414
  • Fix view v1 on tables by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15427
  • Fix datasource picker selected option by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15430
  • Fix selecting 'old row' in row updated trigger. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15432
  • Add feature flag for datasource setting checks by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15434
  • Validate datasource setting on tables by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15433
  • Improving design section JS binding performance by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15431
  • Validate screen relationship datasource settings by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15439
  • Validate screen field datasource settings by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15440
  • Validate screen json array datasource settings by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15441
  • Screen store TS conversion by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15313
  • Type Checkbox.svelte, CheckboxGroup.svelte, and Combobox.svelte. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15447

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.3.1...3.3.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix applying styles to Popover. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15448

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.3.2...3.3.3
